enumDescriptions.Operator: Any user accessing KCS interface will be able to do all the operations that user with Operator privilege can do.
enumDescriptions.Callback: This may be considered the lowest privilege level. Only commands necessary to support initiating a Callback are allowed.
enumDescriptions.Administrator: Any user accessing KCS interface will be able to do all the operations that administrator user can do.
enumDescriptions.DisableKCS: KCS channel will be disabled for any privilege level.
enumDescriptions.User: Any user accessing KCS interface will be able to do all the operations that user with User privilege can do.

KCSInterface.description: The base type for resources and members that can be linked to.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Privilege.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the current KCS privilege setting.
Privilege.description: The property represents the current KCS privilege.
